string-array.name: data_overview
string-array.item: Seasoned musician Jackson Maine discovers — and falls in love with — struggling artist Ally. She has just about given up on her dream to make it big as a singer until Jack coaxes her into the spotlight. But even…

Once home to the most advanced civilization on Earth, Atlantis is now an underwater kingdom ruled by the power-hungry King Orm. With a vast army at his disposal, Orm plans to conquer the remaining oceanic people…

As the Avengers and their allies have continued to protect the world from threats too large for any one hero to handle, a new danger has emerged from the cosmic shadows: Thanos. A despot of intergalactic infamy…
Five years after an ominous unseen presence drives most of society to suicide, a survivor and her two children make a desperate bid to reach safety.

Singer Freddie Mercury, guitarist Brian May, drummer Roger Taylor and bass guitarist John Deacon take the music world by storm when they form the rock \' n \' roll band Queen in 1970. Hit songs become instant classics.…

On the run in the year 1987, Bumblebee finds refuge in a junkyard in a small Californian beach town. Charlie, on the cusp of turning 18 and trying to find her place in the world, discovers Bumblebee, battle-scarred…
Between personal obligations and training for his next big fight against an opponent with ties to his family \' s past, Adonis Creed is up against the challenge of his life.

Miles Morales is juggling his life between being a high school student and being a spider-man. When Wilson Kingpin Fisk uses a super collider, others from across the Spider-Verse are transported to this dimension.

Investigative journalist Eddie Brock attempts a comeback following a scandal, but accidentally becomes the host of Venom, a violent, super powerful alien symbiote. Soon, he must rely on his newfound powers to protect…

In Depression-era London, a now-grown Jane and Michael Banks, along with Michael\'s three children, are visited by the enigmatic Mary Poppins following a personal loss. Through her unique magical skills, and with…

string-array.name: data_name_tv
string-array.item: Who is Afraid to Fall in Love.

string-array.name: data_overview_tv
string-array.item: This soap opera attracted the attention of many militants, including Natasha Wilona, ​​Verrell Bramasta and Aliando Syarief. Their interesting relationship story was aired on SCTV.

Anak Langit series tells about 3 motorbikes, namely AL, Andra and Kei who live in the Orphanage owned by Babe Rozaq and Nyak Ida. They are foster children Babe Rozaq and Nyak Ida who are closest and are considered like their own children. Al stands for Anak Langit. It turns out he was found Babe Rozaq on the road in front of the mosque when he was a baby. Babe Rozaq considers Al to be a child sent from the sky for himself and Nyak Ida because at that time they did not have a baby.

Yusuf and Azizah. Both of them grew up in a loving family. Yusuf (9 years) grew up to be a handsome, pious, and good at silat, while Azizah (5 years) grew more beautiful and adorable. Yusuf and Azizah were dragged down by the flood, their parents who intended to save turned out to have to be carried away. Luckily, Yusuf managed to attract Azizah to survive the floods. Because of exhaustion, they finally rested in a vehicle that unwittingly took them to Jakarta! How does the story of their lives continue?

The Reversed World is a comedy series program that raises stories about the husbands who left their wives to work abroad. Starting from the story of Akum, Aceng, Idoy and one of Aceng \' s archenemies, Dadang. They must educate children and take care of household affairs which are usually the business of women. While his wife must provide for his family.
A soap opera aired on ANTV. This soap opera was produced by Tobali Putra Productions. Acting Adly Fairuz, Vinessa Inez and many others.
In 2016 ago, this children \'s show won trophies for the category of Favorite Cartoons at the 2016 Mom and Kids Awards event, the story line that was presented varied and aired on MNCTV

The story was raised about a young couple named Rojak (Ojak) and Tati. To make a living, Ojak worked as a motorcycle taxi driver based at the end of the road to the village with two colleagues, Purnomo (Pur) and Sutisna (Tisna), an interesting story and the uniqueness of their family aired by RCTI.

The appearance of Fildan at D \' Academy Asia can be one of the factors increasing the rating of this Asian level program. Dangdut Academy Asia 3 (D \' Academy of Asia 3) will start the Top 10 Concert aired by Indosiar.
Indosiar Cinema, presents a story about life that can be learned wisdom and moral values. Starring Indonesian top actors and actresses.
Angel Wings (or abbreviated as MTB) is a soap opera that airs on ANTV. This soap opera is produced by Verona Pictures.
